home.cta_title: Send your message to the world now.
home.card_1_desc: In this game, you are a digital castaway. To join, just sign up or log in. There are no photos or profiles here, only your words cast into the sea.
home.card_2_desc: Scarcity is valuable. You can write and cast only one message per day. Your letter is put in a bottle and delivered to its destination, not to you.
home.card_3_desc: See the number in the sky? It counts the bottles floating right now. It represents the total messages written by all castaways, waiting for the tide.
home.card_4_desc: Every day at 22:00 (BRT), the great draw happens. Ocean currents take your bottle to a stranger and bring a new one to your shore.
home.card_5_desc: The golden rule: You write to the world, but read what you receive. Your sent messages depart forever. But the bottles that arrive at your beach are saved in your list to read whenever you want.
